basis

Interface GameHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AntGameServer, GameServer

    public interface GameHandler
    This interface is used to communicate game-related events to the server. The game manager use this interface to add games in the server, the server then runs this game with a game thread and finally the game thread use it to remove itself from the server, when it has finished its work.
    Author:
    Nicolas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGame(Game newGame)
      Notifies the server that a game has been created and should be run.
      void removeGameThread(GameThread gameThread)
      Notifies the server that a game thread has terminated its execution and should be removed from the game threads list.

    • Method Detail

      • addGame

        void addGame(Game newGame)
        Notifies the server that a game has been created and should be run.
        Parameters:
        newGame - the game created to be run.

      • removeGameThread

        void removeGameThread(GameThread gameThread)
        Notifies the server that a game thread has terminated its execution and should be removed from the game threads list.
        Parameters:
        gameThread - the game thread to remove.
